import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Us

This is a real-time e-commerce site built with React and Flask.

Our Mission

Our mission is to provide customers with a seamless and enjoyable online shopping experience, offering a wide range of electronics and gadgets at competitive prices.

Features

  • Real-time stock updates using WebSockets
  • User authentication and registration
  • Persistent shopping cart across sessions
  • Order management and tracking
  • Responsive and user-friendly interface

Technology Stack

The frontend is built with React, utilizing React Router for navigation and Context API for state management. The backend is powered by Flask with Flask-SocketIO for real-time communication and MongoDB for data storage.

Contact Us

For any inquiries or support, please contact us at support@shopsphere.com.

); }; export default About;
